attributes.action: Question all MP's who plan on voting against the triggering of article 50.
attributes.background: We, the people of the United Kingdom voted in the majority to leave the European Union. Supreme Court judges ordered that, MP's must vote on triggering article 50. It is our right to know why MP's will go against the will of the people, the same people that employ them.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for questioning MPs about their views and opinions.
